mapper.sql: record_id, user_id, org_id, doctor_name, doctor_phone, doctor_city, org_name, record_date, end_date, create_date
mapper.select:
select
from WSC_RECORD where 1 = 1
and doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and org_name like concat(#{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and doctor_city like concat(#{cityPre,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into WSC_RECORD (record_id, user_id, org_id, doctor_name, doctor_phone, doctor_city, org_name, record_date, end_date, create_date) values (#{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
